text: Tachibana: "What are you working so hard for...?"
Tachibana: "In the end, you’ve kept going this far, huh."
Tachibana: "Hey… can’t you reconsider one more time?"
Tachibana: "Letting your body burn in sweet, delicious poison…"
Tachibana: "Making your amygdala dance with gambling…"
Tachibana: "You won’t have to do them anymore…"
Tachibana: "Soaking in a hangover, pretending to sleep in a warm bed even though you can’t…"
Tachibana: "If you achieve your goal and leave here…"
断ち花: "Until someone finds us again, we’ll have to just wait in that boring list, won’t we…?"
断ち花: "I’m scared to face tomorrow…"
